mapper.select: select id, management_name, management_type, identifier, createtime, updatetime from management_account where id = #{id}
select id, management_name, management_type, identifier, createtime, updatetime from management_account limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into management_account(id, management_name, management_type, identifier, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id}, #{managementName}, #{managementType}, #{identifier}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime})

insert into management_account(id, management_name, management_type, identifier, createtime, updatetime) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.managementName}, #{entity.managementType}, #{entity.identifier}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime})
mapper.update:
update management_account
management_name = #{managementName},
management_type = #{managementType},
identifier = #{identifier},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
where id = #{id}
